description: As a User I want to access orders section So I amend boookings
name: User should be able to amend boookings

elements.name: On ReservationFunctional : Ensuring that an can be amended by adding a new booking

steps.name: I am logged in to reservations2 'uat'

steps.name: I click the view button for an order in the orders table
I ensure the order to be amended matches my last created order
I click the "Edit Order" Button beside "Go to Dashboard" button
I should be taken to "Amending Booking" page
I click the "Add Another Item to Order" button
I should see a modal with header "New Order Item:"
I should see a "Cancel" button and a "Save Changes" button
I should see "From,To,Who,when" sections in the modal
I should see "Available Options" card which should contain "Previous Day" and "Next Day" in the modal
I proceed to change route by clicking the green swap location toggle in the modal
I select a time for 'Add-Ons' Single Train ride in the modal
I should see a new "From,To,Who,when" sections added
I should see a new Available Options Card added
